mapper.update: update d_safe_insp_hazard set hazardid=hazardid ,safeinspid=#{safeinspid} ,findtime=#{findtime} ,position=#{position} ,hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} ,department=#{department} ,responsible=#{responsible} ,reformtime=#{reformtime} ,reformresult=#{reformresult} ,reformstate=#{reformstate} ,remark=#{remark} where hazardid=#{hazardid}

update d_safe_insp_hazard set hazardid=hazardid ,safeinspid=#{safeinspid} ,findtime=#{findtime} ,position=#{position} ,hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} ,department=#{department} ,responsible=#{responsible} ,reformtime=#{reformtime} ,reformresult=#{reformresult} ,reformstate=#{reformstate} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and hazardid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and hazardid =#{Where_Id} and hazardid=#{Where_hazardid} and safeinspid=#{Where_safeinspid} and findtime=#{Where_findtime} and position=#{Where_position} and hazardtypeid=#{Where_hazardtypeid} and department=#{Where_department} and responsible=#{Where_responsible} and reformtime=#{Where_reformtime} and reformresult=#{Where_reformresult} and reformstate=#{Where_reformstate} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.hazardid "hazardid", t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.findtime "findtime", t.position "position", t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.department "department", t.responsible "responsible", t.reformtime "reformtime", t.reformresult "reformresult", t.reformstate "reformstate", t.remark "remark" from d_safe_insp_hazard t where hazardid=#{hazardid}

select t.hazardid "hazardid", t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.findtime "findtime", t.position "position", t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.department "department", t.responsible "responsible", t.reformtime "reformtime", t.reformresult "reformresult", t.reformstate "reformstate", t.remark "remark" from d_safe_insp_hazard t where 1=1 and t.hazardid=#{hazardid} and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.findtime=#{findtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.department=#{department} and t.responsible=#{responsible} and t.reformtime=#{reformtime} and t.reformresult=#{reformresult} and t.reformstate=#{reformstate} and t.remark=#{remark}

select t.hazardid "hazardid", t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.findtime "findtime", t.position "position", t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.department "department", t.responsible "responsible", t.reformtime "reformtime", t.reformresult "reformresult", t.reformstate "reformstate", t.remark "remark" from d_safe_insp_hazard t where 1=1 and t.hazardid=#{hazardid} and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.findtime=#{findtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.department=#{department} and t.responsible=#{responsible} and t.reformtime=#{reformtime} and t.reformresult=#{reformresult} and t.reformstate=#{reformstate} and t.remark=#{remark}
mapper.delete: delete from d_safe_insp_hazard where 1=1 and hazardid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and hazardid =#{Where_Id} and hazardid=#{Where_hazardid} and safeinspid=#{Where_safeinspid} and findtime=#{Where_findtime} and position=#{Where_position} and hazardtypeid=#{Where_hazardtypeid} and department=#{Where_department} and responsible=#{Where_responsible} and reformtime=#{Where_reformtime} and reformresult=#{Where_reformresult} and reformstate=#{Where_reformstate} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.hazardid "hazardid", t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.findtime "findtime", t.position "position", t.hazardtypeid "hazardtypeid", t.department "department", t.responsible "responsible", t.reformtime "reformtime", t.reformresult "reformresult", t.reformstate "reformstate", t.remark "remark" from d_safe_insp_hazard t where 1=1 and t.hazardid=#{hazardid} and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.findtime=#{findtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.department=#{department} and t.responsible=#{responsible} and t.reformtime=#{reformtime} and t.reformresult=#{reformresult} and t.reformstate=#{reformstate} and t.remark=#{remark}

select count(*) from d_safe_insp_hazard t where 1=1 and t.hazardid=#{hazardid} and t.hazardid!=#{NoId} and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.findtime=#{findtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.hazardtypeid=#{hazardtypeid} and t.department=#{department} and t.responsible=#{responsible} and t.reformtime=#{reformtime} and t.reformresult=#{reformresult} and t.reformstate=#{reformstate} and t.remark=#{remark}
